channel.title: Tech Tips on Kris - The Coding Unicorn
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Tips on Kris - The Coding Unicorn

item.title: Kris's Quick Cup of (A)K8S #5 - Housekeeping for Kubernetes Contexts
item.description: In this tech tip we look at what Kubernetes context is and how we can clean up unused Kubernetes contexts.

item.title: Validating quality of Helm Charts with helm lint
item.description: In this tech tip we take a look at how we can use helm lint to validate Helm Charts for errors and best practices prior to deployment to Kubernetes

item.title: Kris's Quick Cup of (A)K8S #4 - HTTP Application Routing add-on in AKS
item.description: In this tech tip we look at how we can easily expose applications running in AKS in dev/test with HTTP Application Routing add-on.

item.title: Kris's Quick Cup of (A)K8S #3 - (Cluster)Role management
item.description: In this tech tip we look at how we can locate a ClusterRole and/or Role and identify which accounts it is assigned to.

item.title: How to override ASP.NET Core application runtime version
item.description: In this post we take a look at how we can make an ASP.NET Core application use a different runtime version than the one it was compiled with.

item.title: Detect and avoid this certificate validation trap in .NET!
item.description: In this post we take a look at how to use ServerCertificateValidationCallback cautiously in .NET without creating security vulnerability in the code.

item.title: Log in to Azure AD without active subscription from Azure CLI
item.description: In this post we take a look at how you can log in to an Azure AD without active subscription from Azure CLI.

item.title: Re-using Azure DevOps Environment efficiently across multiple pipelines
item.description: In this post we take a look at how we can avoid duplication and re-use Azure DevOps Environment across multiple pipelines with variable groups.

item.title: Creating reusable build tasks in Azure DevOps pipelines with templates
item.description: In this post we take a look at how to implement reusable build tasks in Azure DevOps pipelines with templates.

item.title: Handling failed Helm upgrade due to another operation in progress
item.description: How to handle failed helm upgrade with helm rollback

item.title: Kris's Quick Cup of (A)K8S #2
item.description: A few tricks that can make your life easier when working with Kubernetes and AKS

item.title: Improving Pull Request flow with PR templates and PR Completion Stats in Azure DevOps
item.description: Let's take a look at how PR templates and PR Completion Stats extension can help us improve PR flow and quality in Azure DevOps.

item.title: Automate .NET target framework update with PowerShell
item.description: Let's take a look at how we can automate update of .NET target framework across projects with PowerShell.

item.title: Kris's Quick Cup of K8s #1
item.description: 4 helpful commands that can make your life easier when working with Kubernetes and AKS

item.title: Power of --query in Azure CLI
item.description: Let's take a look at how helpful query parameter can be in Azure CLI.
